name: Milo's Junkyard
description:
"MILO'S JUNKYARD" is a game inspired by Marijenburg's childhood favorite movie "Stand by me", directed by Rob Reiner. And more specifically the scene at the junkyard at the beginning of their adventure. Stand by me is an adaptation of the short story "The body" by Stephen King.

A game by : 
Game Design and Art : Charlie de Saint Jores (Marijenburg)
Programming : Clément Landais
Sounds and songs : Public domain

If you have 2 minutes, you can comment the game, that would be great to know what you think. 

If you have 5 minutes, you can fill up the feedback form

If you like the game and want to support us and follow us, we're actually working on a bigger game called "Bill", you can check this out and wishlist it if you think it might be a game you like. It would help us a lot.

Thanks a lot for playing our game!

Charlie 

Game designer and artist

and Clément

Programmer

Our other game : Bill 
currently in development.

Wishlist on steam
